summary: Chevrolet, often called Chevy, is an American car brand started in 1911 by Louis Chevrolet and William Durant. It became part of General Motors (GM) in 1918 and is known for affordable, mainstream vehicles. Chevy cars and trucks are sold worldwide. In recent years, GM has changed where Chevy is sold, leaving Europe but returning to Oceania with popular models like the Camaro. In North America, Chevy offers many types of vehicles, and its name is sometimes used for GM as a whole.
title: Chevrolet
